summary: Request for native AG Grid support in Streamlit to replace the unmaintained third-party component. Users need advanced grid features like grouping and reliable selection.

title: Bar chart does not display for one column data if there is a '.' in the column name
author: teticio
summary: `st.bar_chart` fails to render if a column name contains a dot (`.`). This syntax likely conflicts with internal parsing logic for data access.

title: st.button_to_top
author: limangox
summary: Request for a "Scroll to Top" button component. Useful for long single-page apps to quickly return to the start.

title: st.write() does not honor changes by Styler.relabel_index()
author: ya55en
summary: Pandas Styler changes (like `relabel_index`) are not reflected when rendering with `st.write()` or `st.table()`. Streamlit should respect these Styler modifications.

title: On session start/shutdown hooks
author: jamesbraza
summary: Request for startup and shutdown hooks in Streamlit to manage global resources (database connections, cleanup) that live longer than a session.

title: st.dataframe sorting for line_chart columns is not based on list's numeric values but string
author: beaioun
summary: `LineChartColumn` sorts based on the string representation of the list data rather than numeric values (e.g., sum or average). Sorting should be meaningful for the chart data.

title: Allow user using setup script to interact with streamlit app out of Script runner
author: PaleNeutron
summary: Request for a setup script entry point (e.g., `setup.py`) that runs once at startup outside the script runner context, for initialization tasks.

title: `st.markdown` not using inline code highlighting
author: jamesbraza
summary: Inline code highlighting (backticks) in `st.markdown` is not applying the expected style or syntax highlighting. It renders as plain text.

title: Allow developers to disable extensions to standard markdown
author: vdonato
summary: Request to disable specific Markdown extensions (like emoji shortcodes or LaTeX) globally. Sometimes these features interfere with rendering literal text.

title: Select all for a column in data_editor
author: ayhaidar
summary: Request for a "Select All" option in checkbox columns within `st.data_editor`. Users want to toggle all rows at once.

title: Request: direct integration with `pydantic`'s `BaseModel` for autocreating UIs
author: jamesbraza
summary: Request for direct integration with Pydantic models to auto-generate UI forms. This would simplify creating inputs for structured data classes.

title: Allow configuring magic commands default parameters
author: lucas-labs
summary: Request to configure default parameters for magic commands (e.g., setting `use_container_width=True` for all magic dataframes) via `config.toml`.

title: Simple Sidebar File Tree Explorer
author: mmichal9
summary: Request for a native File Tree Explorer widget to navigate and select files/folders on the server, useful for local data processing apps.

title: date input disable dates on weekends
author: ivy113
summary: Request to disable specific dates (like weekends) in `st.date_input` to prevent invalid selections.

title: Range - Column configuration
author: fizcris
summary: Request for a Range Column in `st.dataframe` to visualize a value's position within a min/max range, similar to a progress bar but for ranges.

title: Enable download button to download from file path
author: sfc-gh-maliu
summary: Request for `st.download_button` to accept a file path string directly, streaming the file from disk instead of requiring bytes in memory.

title: On demand wake-up/sleep app
author: viniciusarruda
summary: Request for an "on-demand" wake/sleep mode for apps. Apps would shut down after inactivity to save resources and wake up on new requests.

title: Make it possible to embed links in line charts.
author: ProjectsByJackHe
summary: Request to support hyperlinks in chart axis labels. Clicking a label (e.g., a date) would navigate to a related URL.

title: Prevent submit of TextInput if Shift is pressed (along with Enter)
author: jeromeroussin
summary: Request to prevent `st.text_input` submission when Shift+Enter is pressed, reserving Enter for submit and Shift+Enter for new lines or ignored interaction.

title: Move text_input label from top to left
author: psilons
summary: Request to position widget labels to the left of the input field instead of on top. This standard form layout saves vertical space.

title: st.selectbox doesn't highlight/scroll-to default selections beyond index value of 7
author: bradley-hf
summary: `st.selectbox` dropdowns do not auto-scroll to the selected item if it is far down the list (index > 7). Users have to manually scroll to find the current selection.

title: Add --config-file arg to `streamlit run` for manual specification of config.toml location
author: cwurman
summary: A request to add a `--config-file` argument to `streamlit run`. This allows users to manually specify the path to a `config.toml` file, enabling flexibility for projects where the config isn't in the default location.

title: Tooltip on cell hover for st.dataframe
author: sfc-gh-cserrano
summary: Request for tooltip support on cell hover in `st.dataframe`. This is useful for displaying full content of long text cells or showing additional context without cluttering the table view.

title: Multiple Runtime instances
author: whitphx
summary: A request to allow multiple `Runtime` instances to exist simultaneously within a single process. This is primarily driven by `stlite` needs to run multiple independent Streamlit environments on one server.

title: Add a "Code Column" type to column configs to display formatted programming code or json
author: twiggy
summary: Request for a "Code Column" type in `st.column_config` to display formatted code snippets or JSON within `st.dataframe` cells, similar to `st.code`.

title: [BUG]:  Keyboard focus on mobile devices using st.selectbox
author: iamrishan
summary: A bug where the mobile keyboard remains open after making a selection in `st.selectbox`. It should automatically close to improve the mobile user experience.

title: Choose if anchor button will be showed or not in st.markdown in a title tag outside a anchor tag
author: ViniciusgCaetano
summary: Request to disable the anchor link icon that appears on hover for headers rendered via `st.markdown` with HTML. Users finding the automatic anchor links intrusive in custom HTML layouts.

title: Support Markdown in the options of `st.selectbox` and `st.multiselect`
author: orencio
labels: type:enhancement, good first issue, feature:st.radio, feature:st.selectbox
summary: Request to support Markdown rendering in the options of `st.selectbox` and `st.multiselect`. This would allow for rich text options like bolding, italics, or even images within the dropdown.

title: st.link_button to open in same tab
author: Harisathwik
summary: Request to add an option to `st.link_button` to open links in the same tab instead of a new one. This helps preserve session state when navigating within a multipage app structure.

title: Add an on_click parameter to st.link_button
author: dwvisser
summary: Request to add an `on_click` callback parameter to `st.link_button`, similar to `st.button`. This allows executing server-side logic (like logging a click) before the redirection happens.

title: Passing the Authentication token from domain A to domain B, CORS issue
author: spicoflorin
summary: Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) issues when embedding a Streamlit app in an iframe and attempting to pass authentication tokens via headers. Users need guidance or a fix to handle cross-domain auth headers.

title: Display df with double sorting capablities
author: dor-lev
summary: Request for multi-column sorting in `st.dataframe` (and `st.data_editor`). Users want to sort by a primary column, then a secondary column, etc., by clicking headers sequentially.

title: Limiting maximum and minimum of st.date_input's selectable dates to the maximum/minimum of datetime.datetime
author: bouncy-turtle
summary: `st.date_input` crashes or behaves unexpectedly when initialized with `datetime.max` because it tries to add a 10-year buffer for the max selectable date, overflowing the allowed range.

title: Interactive/Dynamic Timeline Scheduling Calendar
author: t0erd
summary: Request for a dynamic timeline/scheduling calendar widget (like a Gantt chart) that allows interactive editing of events, start/end times, and dependencies.

title: Better usability, scability for interactive maps with st.empty and streamlit-folium
author: chm10
summary: Request for better integration and scalability of interactive maps (Folium) with `st.empty`. Users want to update map layers efficiently without reloading the entire map widget.

title: st.cache: allow option to not cache empty result sets
author: sfc-gh-bhay
summary: Request for an option in `st.cache_data` to skip caching if the result is empty or `None`. This prevents caching transient failures or empty states that might become valid later.

title: st.image reduced display quality and size of original image when rendering wide image, looks blurry even in wide mode with enough space
author: Antonoko
summary: `st.image` reduces the resolution of very wide images, causing blurriness even in "wide" mode. Users want the option to display images at original resolution/quality.

title: graphviz node spacing expanding for no reason in nodes shape=record
author: kirbai
summary: Graphviz chart rendering adds excessive whitespace to the right of record-shaped nodes, distorting the layout. This seems to be a rendering bug in `st.graphviz_chart`.

title: Ability to set number of decimal places shown in data_editor SelectboxColumn
author: daugihao
summary: Request to control decimal precision for floating-point numbers displayed in `SelectboxColumn` within `st.data_editor`. Currently, it lacks formatting options compared to `NumberColumn`.

title: Inconsistent display of 'help' in st.markdown
author: arnaudmiribel
summary: Visual inconsistency: The help tooltip icon looks different when used in `st.markdown` vs. `st.title`. Users request a unified look for tooltips across all text elements.

title: `st.button("+")` or `st.button("-")` results in empty button
author: jrieke
labels: type:enhancement, good first issue, area:widgets, feature:st.button
summary: `st.button("+")` or `st.button("-")` renders as an empty button without the label. This is likely a markdown parsing issue treating these characters as special list markers.

title: It would be great to add error texts into the text_input
author: dilipthakkar
summary: Request to add an `error_message` parameter to `st.text_input` (and others) to display validation errors directly associated with the widget, similar to `st.error` but tighter UI coupling.

title: Enable App admins to broadcast a message to all users
author: info-rchitect
summary: Request for a built-in mechanism for app admins to broadcast messages (e.g., downtime warnings) to all active users of a Streamlit app in real-time.

title: Add a "position" parameter/property to st.sidebar in order to be able to display the sidbar at LEFT, TOP, RIGHT of the screen
author: ajerni
summary: Request to position the sidebar on the right, top, or bottom, instead of just the left. Users want more flexible layout options for the navigation/control panel.

title: Improve `st.text_area` submission on mobile
author: 5shekel
summary: Submitting `st.text_area` on mobile is difficult as `Ctrl+Enter` isn't available. Users suggest adding a submit button or alternative mobile-friendly gesture (like unfocus) to trigger submission.

title: Matrix instead of only table/dataframe
author: jllcen2011
summary: Request for a Matrix visual (like Power BI's) or pivot table in Streamlit. This would allow hierarchical row/column headers and expand/collapse functionality for data analysis.

title: Streamlit bi-directional components not loading when using Bazel to build and run the app
author: christianaaronschroeder
summary: Bi-directional custom components fail to load when the Streamlit app is built/run using Bazel. The component's frontend assets don't seem to be served correctly in this environment.

title: control resampling algorithm in `st.image`
author: 5shekel
summary: Request to control the image resampling algorithm in `st.image`. The default `BILINEAR` makes pixel art or small bitmaps look blurry; `NEAREST` would be better for these cases.

title: st.selectbox and st.multiselect strict matching to user input
author: CHerSun
summary: Request for "strict" matching options in `st.selectbox` and `st.multiselect` search (e.g., "starts with", "contains"). The current fuzzy matching can be too broad for IDs or specific codes.

title: Altair plots can't be exported to vega editors
author: arogozhnikov
summary: The "Open in Vega Editor" context menu item in Altair charts fails to load data because the data isn't embedded in the exported JSON. Users want to be able to debug/edit charts externally.

title: Script reruns cause elements in expanded `st.status` containers to appear as grey artefacts prior to their animation
author: snehankekre
summary: Elements inside an expanded `st.status` container appear as greyed-out artifacts on reruns before animating in. This visual glitch creates a jarring user experience during updates.

title: Callback state change issue on date widget
author: RmStorm
summary: Setting `st.date_input` value programmatically via session state triggers the `on_change` callback if the type changes (e.g. `datetime` to `date` cast), which is unexpected.

title: CLI should not make blocking interactive requests unexpectedly
author: PeterJCLaw
summary: The Streamlit CLI prompts for an email address on first run, which blocks execution in non-interactive environments (like CI/CD). It should detect non-interactive shells and skip the prompt.

title: Allow customization of chat_input keybindings for newline and send actions
author: yongyaoduan
summary: Request to customize keybindings for `st.chat_input`. Users find the default (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for newline) prone to accidental sends and want to swap or change them.

title: st.selectbox user experience is confusing.
author: hucker
summary: `st.selectbox` UI is confusing for read-only use cases. Arrow keys can scroll the selected item out of view. Users request a read-only mode or better scroll behavior to keep selection visible.

title: Make horizontal `st.radio` stretch the entire width
author: ashvardanian
summary: Horizontal `st.radio` groups do not expand to fill the container width. Users want an option to justify or stretch radio buttons to occupy available horizontal space.

title: Built-In run_query with session_state
author: msquaredds
summary: Request for a simplified `run_query` method that integrates connection, query execution, and error handling with session state caching in a single line of code.

title: Add form validation to make form fields required
author: bararan
summary: Request for native form validation (e.g., `required=True` on inputs). Currently, checking for required fields and preventing submission requires manual boilerplate logic.

title: st.progress with recurring timer, key and callback
author: draput
summary: Request for a timer-based progress bar (`st.progress` with callback/interval). This would allow updating progress of long-running backend tasks without blocking the script execution loop.

title: Link redirect
author: romanin-rf
summary: Request for `st.redirect(url)` to programmatically navigate the user to an external URL. Useful for OAuth flows or linking to other apps based on logic.

title: New embed_options to select the default theme or unset the theme setting
author: whitphx
summary: Request for `embed_options` to set or clear the default theme preference in embedded apps. This helps force a specific theme (light/dark) for users who have visited before.

title: Chat History in `st.chat_input` widget
author: trailblazser
summary: Request for chat history navigation (up/down arrows) in `st.chat_input`, similar to a terminal command history. Users want to easily recall and edit previous messages.

title: Allow developer to limit the max number of results to show in the st.selectbox dropdown to improve widget performance
author: smc395
summary: Request to limit the number of results displayed in `st.selectbox` dropdown to improve performance with large datasets. Rendering thousands of DOM elements slows down the browser.

title: st.date_input does not recognize two-digit, keyed-in, day for end date if valid single-digit day exists
author: sfc-gh-dmatthews
summary: `st.date_input` date range picker aggressively auto-completes single-digit days, preventing users from typing two-digit days (e.g., typing "12" selects "1" then "2").

title: data_editor: num_rows - option to allow for only adding or only deleting rows
author: bruestles
summary: Request to configure `st.data_editor` to allow adding rows but *disable* deleting them (or vice versa). Currently, `num_rows="dynamic"` enables both.

title: `st.session_state` becoming empty intermittently
author: eldos-dl
summary: `st.session_state` values seem to be lost intermittently when rapid updates/reruns happen, especially with blocking operations like `time.sleep`. This suggests a race condition.

title: Health check endpoint seems to break when deployed in certain cloud environments
author: pastorsj-dlt
summary: Health check endpoint (`/_stcore/health`) returns text "ok" but the frontend expects JSON, causing parse errors and page refreshes in some Docker/Cloud deployments.

title: 404 health check when navigating directly to a subpage
author: Raytray
summary: Navigating directly to a subpage in a multipage app triggers 404 errors for health checks on relative paths. The health check URL construction needs to be absolute or root-relative.

title: Visual customization for st.toast
author: iuiu34
summary: Request to customize the visual style of `st.toast` (size, position, color). Users want toasts to match their app's branding or be more prominent.

title: Autocomplete for chat_input
author: liunux4odoo
summary: Request for autocomplete suggestions in `st.chat_input` as the user types. This would help with discoverability of available commands or common questions.

title: Allow passing an explicit list of selectable dates to st.date_input
author: CarlosDomingues
summary: Request to pass a specific list of `selectable_dates` to `st.date_input`. This enables blocking out weekends, holidays, or unavailable slots in booking apps.

title: Create virtual columns in data editor and dataframe (columns based on other columns)
author: ViniciusgCaetano
summary: Request for "virtual columns" in `st.data_editor` where values are computed based on other columns (like Excel formulas) and update live during editing.

title: UI jitters, chart flashes for minutes when a complex Altair chart is used in multipage app (Chrome)
author: dcbb
summary: Complex Altair charts in multipage apps cause the UI to jitter and flash for extended periods on Chrome. This seems to be a layout/rendering race condition.

title: Sticky/Fixed Containers
author: ACB-prgm
summary: Request for sticky/fixed containers (`st.fixed_container`) that stay in place while the rest of the page scrolls. Useful for headers, footers, or floating toolbars.

title: Hover events in st.button
author: sherjilozair
summary: Request for hover events on `st.button` (e.g., `on_hover`). This would allow triggering actions or showing preview information when the user mouses over a button.

title: Restrict filetypes that can be uploaded via API request in accordance with st.file_uploader type parameter
author: carolinefrasca
summary: Security vulnerability: `st.file_uploader` type restrictions are client-side only. API requests can bypass this and upload restricted file types (e.g., executables) to the server.

title: Improve support for dict values in `st.dataframe`
author: asishm-wk
summary: Dictionaries in `st.dataframe` cells do not display keys with `None` or `NaN` values. Users expect all dictionary entries to be rendered regardless of value.

title: Buttons in dataframe / table cells with callbacks
author: dpinol
summary: Request for action buttons inside dataframe rows (`ButtonColumn`). Clicking a button would trigger a callback with the specific row's context.

title: Support for python NaN in component-lib
author: sfc-gh-mcheng
summary: Custom components fail to handle Python `NaN` values (float) in JSON serialization, causing crashes. Streamlit should handle `NaN` serialization gracefully for components.

title: Hide columns via Pandas styler
author: Nemecsek
summary: Columns hidden via Pandas Styler (`style.hide()`) are still visible when rendered with `st.dataframe`. Streamlit should respect the visibility settings from the Styler object.

title: Support multi-part uploads
author: arogozhnikov
summary: Request to support multi-part / chunked file uploads in `st.file_uploader`. This helps bypass size limits imposed by proxies (like Cloudflare) on single requests.

title: chat_message avatar is not being served at the right prefix
author: ktaletsk
summary: `st.chat_message` avatars do not respect the `baseUrlPath` proxy configuration, resulting in broken images when running behind a reverse proxy with a path prefix.

title: Is it possible to make Streamlit interactive plot as fast as Plotly?
author: Scoodood
summary: Interactive Plotly charts with sliders are much slower in Streamlit compared to native Plotly. Users want optimizations to make Streamlit's wrapper as responsive as raw Plotly.

title: Bad message format error when using containers
author: jkrshnmenon
summary: Using `st.container` with `st.text_area` inside a conditional block can cause a "Bad message format" error on the frontend. This suggests a delta synchronization bug.

title: safelist html for static file server
author: lmeyerov
summary: Static HTML files served by Streamlit are served as plain text. Users request whitelisting `.html` extension to be served with the correct `text/html` content type.

title: Keep header style when using st.dataframe
author: julienbosse
summary: Header styling applied via Pandas Styler is ignored by `st.dataframe`. Users want custom header colors/styles to be preserved in the rendered table.

title: st.chat_message - ability to append to previous message
author: sfc-gh-jcarroll
summary: Request for an `append` mode in `st.chat_message` to add content to the previous message bubble without creating a new avatar block. Useful for streaming multiple chunks.

title: Page automatically scrolls itself when interacting with widgets
author: xinyu-dev
summary: Page scroll position jumps unexpectedly when interacting with widgets (like radio buttons) that change the layout height. Streamlit should maintain scroll stability.

title: `format_func` for `st.metric`
author: jrieke
summary: Request to add `format_func` to `st.metric`. This allows custom formatting of the displayed value (e.g., adding units or currency symbols) without altering the raw data.

title: Custom config options in `config.toml`
author: DBX12
summary: Request to allow arbitrary custom configuration sections in `config.toml` that can be accessed via code. This allows app-specific settings to be managed centrally.

title: color_picker in `st.data_editor`
author: nemeskolos
summary: Request for a `ColorPickerColumn` in `st.data_editor`. Users want to pick colors for data rows visually directly within the grid.

title: Accept list types for min and max values in `column_config`
author: tahaum
summary: Request for `min_value` and `max_value` in `column_config` to accept lists/arrays, enforcing row-specific limits. E.g., Column B value must be greater than Column A value for that row.

title: Iterator methods for `st.progress` (similar to `tqdm` progress bar)
author: kaydotdev
summary: Request to make `st.progress` iterable (like `tqdm`), automatically updating the bar as it iterates over a sequence. This reduces boilerplate for loop progress tracking.

title: Add a "Copy to Clipboard" button in `st.chat()` elements
author: CharlyWargnier
summary: Request for a "Copy to Clipboard" button on `st.chat_message` bubbles. This makes it easy for users to copy AI responses or text.

title: App width error: content intermittently shifts and automatically scrolls horizontally back into correct position
author: sfc-gh-dmatthews
summary: The developer menu pushes app content sideways, which then slides back. This visual glitch happens intermittently during resizing or zooming.

title: enhance `st.column_config` in `st.dataframe` to show list of URLs or to accept raw HTML
author: luca-ferreri
summary: Request for `st.column_config` to support lists of URLs or raw HTML in a single cell. Users want to display multiple links per row.

title: Cannot catch errors in widget callbacks
author: lyger
summary: Exceptions raised inside widget callbacks are handled by Streamlit's default error handler and cannot be caught by `try/except` blocks around the widget. Users want better error handling for callbacks.

title: Make code from `st.echo` show up in an expander
author: jrieke
summary: Request to optionally wrap `st.echo` output in an `st.expander`. This helps hide long code blocks by default while keeping them accessible.

title: Compact layout and compact widgets to get the most from the available screen space
author: dcbb
summary: Request for a "Compact Mode" or density settings. Streamlit's default layout has a lot of whitespace, which is suboptimal for information-dense dashboards or power user interfaces.

title: Pre-scroll `st.dataframe` and `st.data_editor` to a given initial position
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Request to initialize `st.dataframe` pre-scrolled to a specific row/column index. This helps focus the user's attention on relevant data points upon load.

title: Add totals row to st.dataframe
author: msquaredds
summary: Request for a native "Totals" row in `st.dataframe` that stays pinned at the bottom. Users want summary statistics to be always visible.

title: st.metric: double delta
author: ignareyesa
summary: Request to support multiple delta values in `st.metric` (e.g., one for WoW change, one for MoM). This allows richer KPI displays.

title: Provide async programming guide with streamlit (progress bar)
author: xareelee
summary: Request for an official guide and better support for `asyncio` in Streamlit. Users struggle to run async tasks and update the UI (like progress bars) concurrently.

title: Allow multiple, named custom themes
author: birdup000
summary: Request to define multiple named custom themes in `config.toml` and switch between them programmatically or via the UI. Currently only one custom theme is supported.

title: st.image ignores EXIF orientation information on jpeg image
author: jeroen2442
summary: `st.image` ignores EXIF orientation tags for JPEGs, causing some photos (e.g., form phones) to display sideways or upside down.

title: Access to the st.spinner object as a stand-alone UI element
author: mkleinbort-ic
summary: Request to expose `st.spinner` as a standalone element object that can be placed in a container/placeholder, rather than just a context manager.

title: Support multiple sidebars and put the page list into a separated sidebar
author: xareelee
summary: Request to support multiple sidebars (left and right) or separate sidebars for navigation vs. tool settings. Users run out of space in the single sidebar.

title: st.column_config.TextColumn: Make validation error visible for end user
author: robingie
summary: Validation errors in `TextColumn` (regex) silently reject input. Users want a visible error message or visual cue (red border) explaining why the input was rejected.

title: Allow multiple Images to be displayed in ImageColumn
author: akshanshkmr
summary: Request for `ImageColumn` to support displaying multiple images in a single cell (e.g., list of avatars). Currently limited to one image per cell.

title: 3-way checkbox
author: CHerSun
summary: Request for a 3-state checkbox (`True`, `False`, `None`/Indeterminate). This is useful for hierarchical selections or tri-state filtering logic.

title: Add source formatting to ImageColumn
author: ibnesayeed
summary: Request for format strings in `ImageColumn` (e.g., `https://cdn.com/{}.jpg`) to construct image URLs dynamically from cell values.

title: Dataframe scrollbars are too tiny
author: thierry-bm
summary: Scrollbars in `st.dataframe` are too thin and hard to grab. Users request wider scrollbars or adherence to system scrollbar styling.

title: Execute streamlit scripts/apps by Python without any warning as a pure script
author: xareelee
summary: Running Streamlit scripts directly with `python app.py` prints a warning. Users want to suppress this warning when using Streamlit for headless tasks like data logging.

title: Sticky header like frozen rows in Excel.
author: eliphatfs
summary: Request for sticky/frozen headers in the main page layout. Users want elements like progress bars or filters to remain visible while scrolling down content.

title: `st.protect` or `st.lock` : Option to override all widgets to `disabled=True` during a process (and later discard override)
author: MathCatsAnd
summary: Request for a global `st.lock()` or `st.disable_all()` to temporarily disable all widgets during a long-running process, preventing race conditions from user interaction.

title: Add Copy to Clipboard feature  to Markdown and other fields
author: Hyperrick
summary: Request for a "Copy to Clipboard" feature for `st.markdown`, `st.text`, and other text elements, similar to code blocks.

title: Remove "built with streamlit" when embedding app on another page
author: sahil-lalani
summary: Request to remove the "Built with Streamlit" footer when embedding apps via iframe. Users want a white-label experience for embedded content.

title: Widget help parameter should accept an html string
author: shakamoushie
summary: Widget `help` tooltips render Markdown but do not support HTML. Users want rich formatting (colors, layout) inside tooltips via HTML.

title: Data Input widgets to accept voice and convert it to text
author: shakamoushie
summary: Request for speech-to-text input in text widgets. Users want a microphone button to dictate input into `st.text_input` or `st.chat_input`.

title: Add `st.video_input` or allow capturing video in `st.camera_input`
author: shakamoushie
summary: Request to capture video via `st.camera_input` (or a new `st.video_input`). Currently, it only captures static photos.

title: Widget Visibility Parameter
author: shakamoushie
summary: Request for a `visible` parameter on widgets to programmatically hide/show them without conditional rendering logic that might reset their state.

title: Add option of changing tab name font size
author: tahaum
summary: Request to change the font size of `st.tabs` names. Users find the default tab font too small and want a parameter or styling option to increase readability.

title: Display styled Pandas DataFrame without first converting to HTML
author: Jacques2101
summary: Request for `st.dataframe` to respect `pandas.Styler` CSS properties like `text-align`. Users want to style tables (e.g., centering text) without resorting to rendering raw HTML strings.

title: Support more specialized types for `st.text_input` (email, url, phone,...)
author: jrieke
summary: Request for specialized `type` arguments in `st.text_input` (e.g., "email", "url", "phone"). This would trigger native browser validation and appropriate keyboards on mobile devices.

title: st.cache_resource alternative for non-threadsafe object (that can't be serialized / used with st.cache_data)
author: JacobHayes
summary: Request for a caching mechanism (`st.cache_thread` or similar) for non-thread-safe objects that cannot be pickled (like some API clients). Users need a way to reuse these resources safely across reruns.

title: Drag-and-drop reordering for st.multiselect
author: arogozhnikov
summary: Request for drag-and-drop reordering in `st.multiselect`. Users want to rearrange selected items easily without deleting and re-selecting them in the correct order.

title: A decorator to safely run a slow function without blocking the main application
author: mkleinbort-ic
summary: Request for a decorator (e.g., `@st.run_in_background`) to execute slow functions without blocking the main app flow. The UI would render placeholders that get filled when the background task completes.

title: How to make line_chart does not show null values
author: kcloze
summary: Request to handle `None` or `NaN` values in `st.line_chart` by creating gaps in the line instead of connecting points across the missing data. Users want discontinuous lines for missing data segments.

title: Text alignment in buttons
author: shakamoushie
summary: Request for text alignment options (`left`, `center`, `right`) in `st.button` and other widgets, especially when `use_container_width=True`. Users want better control over label positioning.

title: Adding the ability to change font size/color of the values in st.metric
author: Shom770
summary: Request to customize the font size and color of the value in `st.metric`. Users want to change the visual prominence of the metric value or use color to indicate status (e.g., red for danger).

title: Allow for styles argument in widgets
author: ppallesen
summary: Request for a `styles` argument in widgets to pass CSS directly (e.g., `styles={'border': '1px solid red'}`). This would allow component-level styling without writing global CSS hacks.

title: Schedule clear cache
author: danilo-css
summary: Request to schedule cache clearing or set a specific expiry time/date for `st.cache_data`. Users want data to refresh automatically at specific intervals (e.g., daily at 6 AM) rather than just TTL.

title: Catch streamlit.runtime.caching.cache_data_api ?
author: maxibor
summary: Request to suppress or catch the "No runtime found" warning when running Streamlit code in a raw Python script context. This allows reusing Streamlit logic in non-app scripts without noise.

title: Graceful Shutdown of Server
author: hucker
summary: Request for a programmatic way to gracefully shut down or restart the Streamlit server (e.g., `st.stop_server()`). Useful for automated maintenance scripts or admin interfaces.

title: server side rendering
author: devxpy
summary: Request for Server-Side Rendering (SSR) of the initial HTML to improve load times and SEO. Currently, Streamlit waits for JS to load and WebSocket to connect before rendering content.

title: Components with height 0 still take up space
author: hansthen
summary: Custom components with `height=0` still occupy visible vertical space due to padding/margins. Users request that zero-height components be completely invisible/collapsed.

title: Long-lived session support (memory reduction)
author: jakubxy08
summary: Request for better memory management for long-lived sessions. Apps running for days consume increasing memory, potentially due to leaks or state accumulation. Users want stable memory usage over time.

title: Allow full control over table formatting with Styler
author: quantoid
summary: Request for `st.dataframe` to support HTML rendering within cells when provided via a Pandas Styler. Users want rich cell formatting (links, images) while keeping the interactive dataframe features.

title: Configurable column responsiveness width threshold
author: quantoid
summary: Request to configure the width threshold for column wrapping. Users want control over when columns stack vertically vs. staying horizontal, to better adapt to different screen sizes.

title: Support controlled components like React whose values can be controlled via passed arguments
author: whitphx
summary: Request for "controlled" components where the widget value can be set programmatically on every run, overriding user input if needed. This pattern is common in React for synchronized widgets.

title: Social sharing meta tags outside of Community Cloud
author: tushar-31093
summary: Request to support custom meta tags (for social sharing/SEO) in apps hosted outside Community Cloud. Users want to define these tags in `config.toml` or via `st.set_page_config`.

title: Get unique identifier for every visitor
author: LiShaoyu5
summary: Request for a unique persistent identifier for each app visitor (`st.user_info()`) to track user history or settings across sessions without requiring login.

title: Allow editing session state value to programmatically set state of `st.data_editor`
author: bhavaniravi
summary: Updates to `st.session_state` for `st.data_editor` (e.g., resetting `deleted_rows`) do not trigger a re-render or update the editor state. Users want programmatic control over the editor's data.

title: Stopping an asyncio producer-consumer script causes "session_state" has no key
author: HHest
summary: Stopping an `asyncio` loop in Streamlit raises a `KeyError` for session state variables, even if they were initialized. The state seems to be lost or inaccessible during the interrupt handling.

title: Infinite loop after breaking
author: ConorDoyle314
summary: Infinite loops in Streamlit scripts sometimes continue running even after the user tries to stop the app or the condition breaks. The script runner fails to terminate the execution loop properly.

title: How to submit multiple forms simultaneously? Alternatively, use st.button() instead of st.form.form_ submit_ buttom()
author: Zimix0
summary: Request to submit multiple forms simultaneously or use a regular `st.button` to trigger form submission. Users want more flexible form submission logic beyond `st.form_submit_button`.

title: Make color theme used for `prefers-color-scheme` CSS feature align with Streamlit light/dark modes
author: caksoylar
summary: The `prefers-color-scheme` CSS feature tracks the OS theme, ignoring the Streamlit app's selected theme. Users want Streamlit to propagate its active theme to the CSS media query.

title: Improve display of many files in `st.file_uploader`
author: Hackerran123
summary: Request to improve the display of many files in `st.file_uploader`. The current pagination is limited. Users want scrollable lists or configurable page sizes for file lists.

title: Long chart labels are cropped
author: jrieke
summary: Long axis labels in Altair/Vega charts get cropped or cut off. Streamlit's chart container does not reserve enough space for labels automatically.

title: 1 second resolution for st.time_input
author: kzhao682
summary: Request for second or millisecond precision in `st.time_input`. The current widget only supports minutes, limiting its use for high-precision timestamp entry.

title: Handling Security Headers in Streamlit
author: rishi-rxs512
summary: Request for native support to set HTTP security headers (CSP, HSTS, etc.) in Streamlit apps. Currently, this requires a reverse proxy. Users want this built into the Streamlit server configuration.

title: Support isLoading on buttons
author: silverOrdeal
summary: Request for a `loading` state on `st.button` that replaces the label with a spinner. This provides visual feedback during long-running actions triggered by the button.

title: Integrate VegaFusion to move Altair and Vega-Lite transforms out of the browser
author: jonmmease
summary: Request to integrate VegaFusion to pre-process Altair charts on the server side. This reduces the data sent to the browser, improving performance for large datasets in charts.

title: Race conditions resulting in KeyError in module reloading
author: martinal
summary: Module reloading in Streamlit has race conditions causing `KeyError` during imports. This happens when editing files while the app is running.

title: Make "allowed message origins" a config option instead of hard-coded list
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Request to make `allowed-message-origins` configurable via `config.toml`. Currently, it's hardcoded, which is problematic for some deployment environments requiring specific origins.

title: Can't close st.expander after users open it themselves
author: sTomerG
summary: Once an `st.expander` is opened by the user, it cannot be closed programmatically via session state updates. The user's manual interaction overrides programmatic state.

title: Selectbox resets selection on visible name change
author: CHerSun
summary: Updating the visible label of an object in `st.selectbox` options (without changing the object identity) resets the selection. The widget should track selection by value identity, not label.

title: Improve `st.dataframe` to style tables.
author: Nemecsek
summary: Request for extensive styling options in `st.dataframe` (header colors, row colors, fonts) natively, without relying on the slow Pandas Styler.

title: Too much blank space wasted at the top of each page -- allow `st.set_page_config( margin_top = 20 )`
author: fplanque
summary: Request to reduce or configure the top margin of Streamlit apps (`margin_top`). The default whitespace is excessive for some layouts.

title: st.slider keyboard input
author: xR86
summary: Request to allow typing values directly into `st.slider` handles or having an input box alongside it. Dragging to a precise number is difficult.

title: Integrate ipyaggrid into streamlit
author: evasun777
summary: Request to integrate `ipyaggrid` or similar advanced grid features natively. Users want multi-index support and advanced filtering/aggregation capabilities in tables.

title: Expanded date_input
author: hagsted
summary: Request for an expanded mode for `st.date_input` to show the calendar inline instead of in a popover. This reduces clicks for date selection.

title: Option to set the chart background to something else than the primary background
author: hagsted
summary: Request to set the background color of charts independently of the app's theme. Users want charts to have a distinct background (e.g., white) even in dark mode apps.

title: Add capability to filter columns in `st.data_editor` via UI
author: sfc-gh-tridinger
summary: Request for column filtering UI in `st.data_editor` (like Excel). Users want to filter rows interactively by clicking column headers.

title: st.altair_chart unable to display alt.Chart that is deserialized from json
author: michaelchia
summary: `st.altair_chart` fails to render charts deserialized from JSON using `alt.Chart.from_json`. It shows a blank chart.

title: Allow `st.radio` (& co.) values to be formatted with a dict.
author: szabi
summary: Request to allow passing a dictionary to `format_func` in selection widgets. This simplifies mapping internal values to display labels.

title: Widget to host folder as website (for preview)
author: keiranmraine
summary: Request for a widget to serve a local folder as a static website (e.g., for previewing generated documentation).

title: Add parameter to enable/disable text search in `st.selectbox`
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Request to disable text search in `st.selectbox`. For short lists (e.g., Yes/No), the search input behavior can be distracting or unnecessary.

title: Composable/reusable component API for larger apps
author: whitphx
summary: Request for a composable component API (`@st.component`) to encapsulate widget groups with isolated state/keys. This helps organize code in large apps.

title: HTML header and footer customisation
author: tonyallan
summary: Request to customize the HTML `<header>` and `<footer>` content directly. Users want to inject scripts, styles, or custom branding wrapping the app.

title: Histogram slider
author: e-tornike
summary: Request for a histogram slider widget that shows the data distribution behind the slider handle, helping users make informed range selections.

title: Image gallery
author: abhishekkrthakur
summary: Request for an Image Gallery component to display a grid or collection of images with navigation, rather than a vertical list.

title: Copy Column Headers from Streamlit Dataframe
author: hucker
summary: Request to include column headers when copying data from `st.dataframe` to the clipboard. Currently, only data values are copied.

title: Streamlit Cloud should support the --no-root option for poetry install
author: whitphx
summary: Streamlit Cloud should use `poetry install --no-root` to support repo structures where the app isn't a package itself, avoiding installation errors.

title: Pre-cache on start-up
author: BramVanroy
summary: Request for a "pre-cache" mechanism to populate the cache at startup. Users want to warm up the cache so the first user doesn't experience a delay.

title: [Altair] `st.altair_chart` removes data from a compound plot with interaction that works with `altair`
author: gaspardc-met
summary: `st.altair_chart` drops data or renders incorrectly for compound charts (e.g., layered + concatenated) with interactive selections. The data binding seems broken for complex specs.

title: Add datetime input
author: Pydetect
summary: Request for a combined date and time picker widget. Currently, users must use separate `st.date_input` and `st.time_input` widgets.

title: File Uploader: Report failed uploads in multi-upload.
author: LutzFassl
summary: Request for `st.file_uploader` to report which files failed to upload in a multi-upload scenario. Users need feedback if some files were rejected (e.g., due to size).

title: Persist widget state if `key` is set, even if the widget is not rendered
author: sfc-gh-jcarroll
summary: Widgets with a `key` lose their state if they are conditionally hidden (not rendered). Users want an option to persist widget state even when the widget is temporarily removed from the UI.

title: Clean-slate rendering
author: harahu
summary: Request for explicit control over clearing old elements before re-rendering ("clean-slate rendering"). This avoids "ghost" elements lingering during updates.

title: Rename config option `server.enableCORS` to `server.enableCORSProtection`
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Request to rename `server.enableCORS` to `server.enableCORSProtection` to better reflect its function (enabling the security check, not enabling CORS access).

title: st.tabs: know and control state
author: MathCatsAnd
summary: Request for `st.tabs` to expose its state (currently selected tab) and allow programmatic selection. This is needed for controlling navigation flow.

title: Streaming analytics / telemetry to own database
author: ttamg
summary: Request to support sending Streamlit telemetry/analytics to a user-defined endpoint or database, rather than just Streamlit's servers. Enterprises need to own their usage data.

title: Cannot cache modin dask dataframe
author: amritap-ef
summary: `st.cache` fails to hash Modin/Dask dataframes. Users want support for these libraries in the caching hashing logic.

title: Create a multiple range datepicker
author: ViniciusgCaetano
summary: Request for a multi-range date picker. Users want to select multiple discontinuous date ranges (e.g., for booking availability).

title: Make `st.multiselect` retain search string after selecting a matching option
author: KeeonTabrizi
summary: `st.multiselect` clears the search text after selecting an item. Users want an option to keep the search text to easily select multiple items matching the same query.

title: Button or API for users to switch between themes without the Hamburger menu
author: lesser-panda
summary: Request for an API or button to switch the app's theme (Light/Dark) programmatically, exposing this control to the user outside the hamburger menu.

title: Hierarchical multipage navigation
author: CHerSun
summary: Request for a hierarchical sidebar navigation menu with expandable submenus. Users need better organization for apps with many pages.

title: st.sleep
author: Nemecsek
summary: Request for `st.sleep()` that keeps the frontend responsive. `time.sleep()` blocks the server thread, making the UI unresponsive during waits.

title: Provide methods to refresh caching
author: Samreay
summary: Request for a way to refresh specific cached functions programmatically or on a schedule (e.g., update data every morning).

title: Streamlit Cloud App Redirects and Renaming
author: MathCatsAnd
summary: Renaming an app on Community Cloud breaks existing links. Users request automatic redirects or alias support for renamed apps.

title: Invalid value displayed for Python Decimal
author: char101
labels: type:bug, area:arrow, feature:st.dataframe, status:confirmed, priority:P4, upstream
summary: `st.dataframe` displays Python `Decimal` objects as large integers or formatted incorrectly. It should respect the decimal precision.

title: Update width of dataframe cells upon `add_rows`
author: jrieke
summary: `st.dataframe` width calculation happens only on initial render. Adding rows via `add_rows` doesn't trigger a width recalculation, leading to layout issues.

title: Bring your own Redis cache
author: quantoid
summary: Request to support external Redis caches for `st.cache`. This enables sharing cache across multiple replicas of a Streamlit app for scalability.

title: Don't rerun on widget interaction
author: jrieke
summary: Request for an option to *not* rerun the script on widget interaction (e.g., `rerun=False`). Users want to batch updates (like a form) without using `st.form` for everything.

title: Joining user threads
author: tikuma-lsuhsc
summary: Request for a mechanism to join or clean up user threads when the session ends. Currently, background threads can outlive the session.

title: Preserve widget state when a widget disappears from the page (demoed via Multipage Apps)
author: treuille
summary: Widgets inside a multipage app lose state when navigating between pages. Users want session state associated with widget keys to persist across page views.

title: Optimize Streamlit core static files and library imports to reduce app startup time
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Request to optimize the loading of static assets (JS/CSS/fonts) to improve initial app startup time. Lazy loading of non-essential assets is suggested.

title: Misconfigured _xsrf cookies
author: matkozak
summary: Cookie configuration for `_xsrf` is incorrect (missing SameSite/Secure attributes) when deployed behind some proxies, causing auth failures. Users want configurable cookie attributes.

title: Range Slider Widget, does not allow expand on a single selection in both directions
author: coolkau
summary: In `st.select_slider` (range mode), users cannot drag one handle past the other to flip the range. The handles block each other.

title: Cache static files of custom components (currently they always get 304 response)
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Static files for custom components are not cached by the browser (returning 304s). Users request proper caching headers to improve component load performance.

title: Allow setting optgroup when using `st.selectbox`
author: alexscott-ff
summary: Request to support `optgroup` in `st.selectbox` to group related options visually within the dropdown menu.

title: Update components via session_state
author: coolkau
summary: Custom components do not automatically update when their linked session state value changes. Users need a standard way to sync component state from the backend.

title: Widgets are not consistent when displaying decimal separator
author: clo-vis
summary: Decimal separators in widgets (`st.slider` vs `st.number_input`) are inconsistent with locale settings. Some widgets respect locale, others don't.

title: Pytest-friendly Test API
author: leycec
summary: Request for an official, maintained testing framework (`pytest` fixtures) for Streamlit apps. Users want to write integration tests without full browser automation.

title: `Race condition` when using `experimental_get_query_params` and inputs
author: ldmtwo
summary: Race condition when syncing URL query params with widget state. Rapid updates can cause the widget value to revert or get out of sync.

title: Unify the distance between label and help for different widgets
author: PlatonB
summary: The vertical spacing between widget label and help icon varies across widgets. Users request consistent alignment and spacing for UI polish.

title: Allow specifying custom website metadata
author: RubenVanEldik
summary: Request to customize web app metadata (title, description, social image) for SEO and sharing previews via `config.toml`.

title: Password fields don't update on tab when using 1password browser extension
author: blackary
summary: Password fields (`st.text_input(type='password')`) do not update their value when autofilled by password managers (like 1Password). The app doesn't see the input.

title: st.pyplot -> st.pyplot_chart()
author: tylerjrichards
summary: Proposal to rename `st.pyplot` to `st.pyplot_chart` for consistency with other chart commands (`st.altair_chart`, etc.).

title: Let st.line_chart and st.bar_chart accept Series/array objects!
author: tylerjrichards
summary: Request for `st.line_chart` (and others) to accept `pd.Series` or numpy arrays directly as `x`/`y` arguments, instead of requiring a DataFrame.

title: Support a video codec that is LGPL licensed for encoding
author: mathisc
summary: Request for `st.video` to support encoding formats that are LGPL compatible (like VP8/VP9) or ensure compatibility with OpenCV outputs without transcoding.

title: Creating custom components inside a callback does not work correctly
author: aghasemi
summary: Creating a custom component inside a callback function fails to render or disappears immediately. Components should work within callbacks.

title: Options to scale iframe and HTML components
author: ibnesayeed
summary: Request for scaling options for `components.iframe` and `st.html`. Users want to render content at a specific resolution and scale it down to fit the widget area.

title: text_input hidden by checkbox doesn't load from session state
author: isinghmitesh
summary: Input widgets hidden conditionally (e.g., via checkbox) fail to initialize with their value from `session_state` when revealed. They start empty instead.

title: The app says "Please wait..." forever | streamlit running on via Databricks notebook
author: AbishekS01
summary: Streamlit app hangs indefinitely ("Please wait...") when running in a Databricks notebook environment. It seems related to WebSocket or proxy configuration.

title: Data placed in session_state is lost when debugging outside of Streamlit run
author: christian-cooper-shell
summary: Session state is lost/reset when debugging Streamlit scripts in an IDE (without `streamlit run`). Users want a mock session state for debugging context.

title: Bring back colored borders for `st.info`, `st.success`, `st.warning` and `st.error` to improve visibility
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: Request to bring back colored borders for alert boxes (`st.info`, etc.). The new borderless design reduces visibility for some users.

title: Tabs hidden when titles exceed the content area width (no ability to scroll)
author: blipk
summary: `st.tabs` headers get cut off without a scroll mechanism if there are too many tabs to fit the screen width. Users need a way to scroll through tabs.

title: time_input widget Android style.
author: Nemecsek
summary: Request for a clock-style or Android-style time picker for `st.time_input`, which is more intuitive than a long dropdown list of times.

title: Directly provide form submission data to form submit callback
author: robingie
summary: Request to pass form data directly to the `on_click` callback of the submit button. Currently, callbacks run before the form data is updated in session state.

title: Customisable layout sizes
author: CharlyWargnier
summary: Request for customizable layout sizes beyond the default 'centered' and 'wide' modes. Users want more control over the main container width, such as specifying a fixed pixel width or percentage, to better fit their content.

title: Reset widget state by deleting the session state value
author: ChristophBoerlin
summary: Deleting a widget's key from `st.session_state` does not fully reset the widget's visual state in the browser, leading to a mismatch between the UI and the internal state. Users expect removing the key to reset the widget to its default.

title: Automatically send reports to Slack
author: parker84
summary: Request for automated reporting to Slack (e.g., daily screenshots of a dashboard). This functionality is currently missing natively, forcing users to external tools like Tableau for scheduled reporting.

title: "Bad 'setIn' index XX (should be between [0, X])" when using st.cache_data in thread
author: pedgar
labels: type:bug, feature:cache, status:confirmed, priority:P3, feature:st.spinner, area:threading/processing
summary: A "Bad 'setIn' index" error occurs on the frontend when using `st.cache_data` (or experimental_memo) inside a thread. This seems related to the spinner or script context management in threaded execution.

title: Display multiindex dataframe as “sparsified” table
author: sfc-gh-kbregula
summary: Request to improve `st.dataframe` display for MultiIndex DataFrames by sparsifying the index (merging vertically for repeated values), similar to Pandas' console output or HTML display.

title: Make label position a choice
author: osi1880vr
summary: Request to customize label positioning for widgets (e.g., left-aligned labels instead of top). This would help save vertical space and align with different form layout preferences.

title: st.markdown should render tables with a striped design
author: juk-stata
summary: Request for `st.markdown` tables to support striped rows (alternating background colors) for better readability, consistent with GitHub Flavored Markdown rendering on GitHub.

title: Hover text on `selectbox` and `multiselect`
author: harahu
summary: Request for a `hover_func` parameter in `st.selectbox` and `st.multiselect` to show tooltips for individual options. This helps disambiguate items with identical labels without cluttering the UI.

title: Link to tabs via # anchors
author: fredzannarbor
summary: Request to support linking to specific tabs via URL anchors (e.g., `#tab-1`). This allows direct navigation to a specific tab state from external links.

title: Pass state as parameter to `on_change` callback
author: alexscott-ff
summary: Request for `on_change` callbacks to receive the new widget value directly as an argument. Currently, developers must fetch the value from `session_state` inside the callback.

title: Multipage routing with URL param or URL hash
author: whitphx
summary: Request for alternative routing strategies for multipage apps, such as hash-based routing or query parameters, to support deployment environments where path-based routing is restricted.

title: st.map() : display image on hover over  scattered points
author: ysig
summary: Request to display images or custom content in tooltips when hovering over points in `st.map`. Currently, map interactivity is limited compared to other plotting libraries.

title: Latex not rendered in plotly charts
author: edsaac
summary: `st.plotly_chart` fails to render LaTeX in labels or titles, even when configured in Plotly. This limits the ability to display mathematical notation in charts.

title: Impossible to highlight the selection text in `st.selectbox` to delete it all at once
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: In `st.selectbox`, users cannot highlight and delete the current selection text with backspace to clear it. This makes it difficult to clear a selection quickly.

title: Streamlit not detecting changes to multipage apps in WSL2
author: jonstrutz11
labels: type:bug, good first issue, area:windows, priority:P3, feature:multipage-apps, feature:file-watcher
summary: Streamlit file watcher fails to detect changes in nested pages or modules when running in WSL2 (Windows Subsystem for Linux). This breaks hot reloading for development.

title: General colorband command instead of `st.warning` etc.
author: shakamoushie
summary: Request for a generalized `st.colorband` or alert component that accepts a custom color and label, replacing the specific `st.info`, `st.warning`, etc., with a single flexible widget.

title: Support for pydeck custom tile layer
author: giswqs
summary: Request to support custom tile layers in `st.pydeck_chart`. This would enable using specialized map tiles (e.g., from Google Earth Engine) that require custom JavaScript libraries.

title: Interact with local storage
author: sg-s
summary: Request for an API to interact with the browser's local storage (`st.local_storage`). This would allow persisting simple data (like user preferences) across sessions on the client side.

title: Inconsistent behavior when value is outside of (min_value, max_value) for st.slider and st.number_value
author: andreas-gjensidige
summary: `st.slider` and `st.number_input` behave inconsistently when `value` is outside `min/max`. Slider expands the range, while number input raises an error. Users expect consistent validation.

title: Clarify edge case where physical location of element vs semantic location of element are handled
author: blackary
summary: Widgets created in `st.sidebar` behave differently depending on whether they are inside a form or not, specifically regarding rerun triggering. The behavior edge cases need clarification.

title: Switching camera stuck on permissions
author: nehz
summary: Switching cameras in `st.camera_input` on some mobile devices gets stuck in a permissions loop or fails to switch. This affects users with multiple cameras.

title: [Coming soon] Defered data for download button
author: Vinno97
summary: Request for deferred data loading in `st.download_button`. Users want to generate the download data only when the button is clicked (via callback) to avoid performance overhead on every run.

title: empty() does not remove cleared elements?
author: wg-romank
summary: Calling `.empty()` on an `st.empty` container clears the UI but doesn't remove the internal widget state, leading to DuplicateWidgetID errors if widgets are re-added. It should fully clear state.

title: Server headless detection doesn't play nicely with ssh port forwarding
author: astrowonk
summary: Streamlit's headless mode detection incorrectly flags SSH sessions from Windows as headless even when X forwarding is available, preventing the browser from opening.

title: Allow Katex extensions
author: chicolucio
summary: Request to allow loading KaTeX extensions (like `mhchem` for chemistry) in `st.latex`. This would expand the range of scientific notation supported natively.

title: Deactivate responsiveness of st.columns
author: wizzioficial
summary: `st.columns` layout collapses on mobile devices, stacking vertically. While responsive, users sometimes want to force a horizontal layout or have more control over the responsiveness.

title: st.date_input: Error handling with invalid date entry
author: clo-vis
summary: Entering an invalid date (e.g., 0900/01/01) manually into `st.date_input` causes an app crash/error instead of a user-friendly validation message.

title: Make `st.selectbox` dropdown re-open at position of last selected option, not at the top every time
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: `st.selectbox` dropdown always opens at the top of the list, rather than scrolling to the currently selected item. This is annoying for long lists where the selection is far down.

title: format parameter works differently in st.slider and st.number_input
author: jrieke
summary: The `format` parameter syntax is inconsistent between `st.slider` (printf style) and `st.number_input`. Users expect consistent formatting options across numeric widgets.

title: Replace sidebar arrow icon
author: cccs-km
summary: Request to customize the sidebar toggle icon (arrow). Users want to replace it with a custom icon (e.g., a gear) to better indicate its function (like settings).

title: Add Pro camera mode for taking pictures using file_uploader on a smartphone
author: kalfasyan
summary: Request to access "Pro" camera modes (ISO, aperture) when using `st.file_uploader` (or camera input) on mobile. Currently, it uses default camera settings.

title: Allow sharing of Streamlit apps through JupyterHub
author: joseberlines
summary: Request for documentation or support for running Streamlit apps within JupyterHub (e.g., via Voila or proxy). This facilitates sharing apps in data science environments.

title: st.cache_data ignores ttl argument when persist='disk'
author: franekp
summary: `st.cache_data` (experimental_memo) ignores the `ttl` argument when `persist='disk'` is set. Cached data on disk never expires/refreshes automatically.

title: Set the aspect ratio of charts
author: thschaer
summary: Request to set a fixed aspect ratio for charts in `st.plotly_chart`. Currently, charts resize with the container, potentially distorting the intended aspect ratio.

title: Using multiprocessing module
author: PaleNeutron
summary: Using `multiprocessing` in Streamlit scripts is difficult and often results in warnings or errors due to execution context. Users need a supported pattern for parallelism.

title: Doesn't display Altair text when text is positioned with `altair.value()`
author: raaaaaymond
summary: Altair text marks positioned with `altair.value()` do not render in `st.altair_chart`. This seems to be a specific rendering bug for this positioning method.

title: Hide the arrow in the delta of `st.metric`
author: Nemecsek
summary: Request to hide the arrow icon in `st.metric` delta when the delta is a string. Users want to use the delta field for text annotations without implying directionality.

title: Logging strategy should follow the standard
author: whitphx
summary: Streamlit's internal logging configuration conflicts with standard Python logging practices, making it hard for users to configure their own loggers or capture Streamlit logs.

title: Streamlit health check (/healthz) ignoring 302
author: ahtokca
summary: Streamlit's health check endpoint treats HTTP 302 redirects as failures, causing restart loops if an auth proxy redirects the health check. It should handle redirects gracefully.

title: Add select all shortcut or button for multiselect
author: PaleNeutron
summary: Request for "Select All" / "Deselect All" shortcuts or buttons in `st.multiselect`. This improves usability for lists with many options.

title: Time Input Function doesn't support each single time
author: murattasci06
summary: Request for single-minute or custom interval resolution in `st.time_input`. The dropdown currently defaults to 15-minute intervals.

title: Make `st.selectbox` dropdown scroll along with option in focus, when navigating with arrow keys (↑↓)
author: cmayoracurzio
summary: When navigating `st.selectbox` with arrow keys, the dropdown list does not scroll to keep the focused item in view. The user can't see what they are selecting.

title: automatic/dynamic height for iframe/html component
author: derfryday
summary: Request for automatic/dynamic height adjustment for `st.components.v1.html` and iframes. Currently, height must be fixed, leading to scrollbars or whitespace.

title: Cascade input widget
author: PlatonB
summary: Request for a "cascade" or dynamic input widget where new input fields appear automatically as the user fills previous ones (e.g., adding multiple items to a list).

title: Disallow a user to ignore a certain widget
author: PlatonB
summary: Request for a `required=True` parameter for input widgets to prevent the user from leaving them empty or submitting the form without a value.

title: Calling Julia from Streamlit App using PyJulia
author: mercicle
summary: Issues integrating Julia code via PyJulia in Streamlit apps. Users encounter errors with different import methods and execution contexts.

title: streamlit's webserver not working when using BAZEL for installation bug
author: rubenverhack
summary: Streamlit's development mode check fails when installed via Bazel, causing it to run in dev mode unexpectedly. The check relies on file paths that differ in Bazel builds.

title: Integration with Flask - render simple Streamlit component on Flask or Fast API
author: vbabaria
summary: Request to integrate Streamlit components into Flask or FastAPI apps. Users want to embed Streamlit widgets into existing web applications.

title: Rerun on each new keystroke in `st.text_input`
author: knutwannheden
summary: Request for `st.text_input` to trigger a rerun on every keystroke (like search suggestions), rather than just on Enter or blur. Currently requires a workaround.

title: Save logs to a text file, as a parameter in the config.toml
author: AxelArturin
summary: Request to configure logging to a file via `config.toml`. Currently, users must redirect stderr/stdout via shell commands.

title: HTML tags inside <code> get corrupted since v1.5.0
author: Valahaar
labels: type:bug, feature:markdown, status:confirmed, priority:P3, feature:st.code, upstream
summary: Nesting HTML tags inside `<code>` blocks in `st.markdown` renders as `[object Object]` instead of the expected HTML content. This is a regression.

title: An option to keep component values in the session state
author: whitphx
summary: Request for an option to persist component values in `session_state` even if the component is temporarily not rendered. Currently, unmounted widgets lose their state.

title: Force widget setting without needing a key
author: thiemoToadi
summary: Setting a widget's value programmatically (e.g., checking a box) without a key sometimes fails to update the internal state correctly within a form context.

title: Make it possible to control the HTML "type" attr via st.text_input
author: whitphx
summary: Request to set the HTML `type` attribute for `st.text_input` (e.g., "password", "email", "number"). This improves browser behavior like autocomplete and mobile keyboards.

title: Ability to flip st.camera_input preview horizontally
author: comlhj1114
summary: Request to flip/mirror the preview in `st.camera_input` horizontally. The default non-mirrored view is often disorienting for selfie/webcam use.

title: Ability to clear selectbox with long list of options
author: jzcruiser
summary: Request for a "Clear" button in `st.selectbox` to easily reset the selection, especially for long lists where scrolling to the default is tedious.

title: Make caching benchmarkable
author: thunderbug1
summary: Request for benchmarking/profiling tools for `st.cache`. Users want to see memory usage and hit/miss rates to optimize their caching strategy.

title: A widget for reordering lists
author: palle-k
summary: Request for a widget to reorder a list of items (drag-and-drop). This is a common UI pattern missing from the core library.

title: Enable `request_rerun`-ing session through external sources and using a session_id
author: tchaton
summary: Request to trigger a session rerun from an external thread or process, using a session ID. This enables push-based updates from background tasks.

title: Better support st.markdown by dedenting text
author: kmcgrady
summary: Request for `st.markdown` to handle indented text blocks better (dedenting). Currently, indented Markdown (e.g., inside a function) often fails to render correctly.

title: Make picture size returned by camera_input consistent via parameter
author: jkneer
summary: Request to specify the resolution/size of the image returned by `st.camera_input`. Users want consistent image dimensions regardless of the display size.

title: Provide way to run with the WSGI/ASGI protocols
author: StefanBrand
summary: Request to run Streamlit with ASGI/WSGI servers (like Uvicorn/Gunicorn) for better integration with standard Python web deployment stacks.

title: Keybinding to open full list simultaneously in `st.json`
author: BigSalmon2
summary: Request for a keyboard shortcut to expand/collapse all nodes in `st.json`. This aids in exploring large JSON structures.

title: Expose theme colors to HTML components
author: jrieke
summary: HTML components (`st.components.v1.html`) do not inherit Streamlit theme variables (colors, fonts). Users want to style HTML content to match the app theme.

title: Cannot set Plotly theme because Streamlit overrides user values
author: joelbecker
summary: `st.plotly_chart` overrides user-defined Plotly templates/themes with Streamlit's theme. Users want an option to prioritize their custom Plotly configuration.

title: st.file_uploader returns HTTP code 400 with invalid session_id when deployed on Kubernetes
author: JT-R
summary: `st.file_uploader` returns HTTP 400 (Invalid session_id) when deployed on Kubernetes with multiple replicas. Session stickiness or state sharing is needed.

title: Allow console_scripts as streamlit run scripts
author: FlorianWilhelm
summary: Streamlit requires a raw `.py` script path. Users want to run installed console scripts (entry points) directly, e.g., `streamlit run my-command`.

title: [Coming soon] Content alignment option for text elements
author: kaydotdev
summary: Request for text alignment options (`left`, `center`, `right`, `justify`) in `st.markdown`, `st.caption`, and `st.text`. This allows for better typographic layout.

title: Add Yellow color to st.metric
author: MatheusHam
summary: Request to add a "yellow" color option to `st.metric` delta (alongside green/red/gray) to represent "warning" or neutral-but-important states.

title: Set focus on a widget, e.g. for `st.text_input`
author: solarjoe
summary: Request to set focus on a specific widget (e.g., `autofocus` or `st.focus()`). This helps guide the user flow, especially for forms.

title: Selectbox/radio/multiselect widgets copy option values resulting in index errors and other problems
author: kinghuang
summary: Selection widgets (selectbox, radio) copy option values, breaking identity checks for custom objects. They should return the original object reference.

title: Add form.clear() to the API
author: tybirk-mindway
summary: Request for a programmatic `form.clear()` method to reset a form's inputs without necessarily submitting it.

title: More button types and colors
author: murtazabasu
summary: Request for more button styles (colors, shapes) beyond primary/secondary. Users want to customize buttons to signify different actions (danger, success, etc.).

title: on_change not called for first session_state value
author: kinghuang
summary: The `on_change` callback is not fired when a widget is initialized with a default value. It only fires on subsequent user interactions.

title: Deleting a file_uploader may cause streamlit to not GC its orphaned files
author: vdonato
summary: Deleting a `file_uploader` widget might not trigger garbage collection of the uploaded file immediately, leading to temporary storage leaks.

title: Element values are not restored properly after `st.rerun`
author: whitphx
summary: Widget values are sometimes not restored correctly after `st.rerun()`, reverting to defaults instead of preserving the user's input.

title: A way to add Python functionalities/custom HTML/CSS code to streamlit
author: pranavr2003
summary: Request for a way to inject custom HTML/CSS/JS into the app header/body more easily than `st.markdown(unsafe_allow_html=True)`, for advanced styling.

title: Ability to register custom exception handler
author: tvst
summary: Request to register a custom global exception handler. This allows apps to log unhandled errors to services like Sentry before showing the error to the user.

title: file_uploader limit number of uploaded files
author: cceyda
summary: Request to limit the *number* of files in `st.file_uploader`, not just the size. This prevents users from uploading thousands of files and crashing the app.

title: Make st.image accept an emoji
author: jrieke
summary: Request for `st.image` to accept emojis (strings) directly, rendering them as high-res graphics. This simplifies adding icons/emojis as visual elements.

title: Improve naming convention for saved audio files from `st.audio`
author: oplatek
summary: Request to customize the filename of audio downloads from `st.audio`. Currently, it uses a random hash, which is not user-friendly.

title: Caching improvements
author: dbalabka
summary: Extensive request for caching improvements: disk persistence configuration, S3 support, alternate serialization (Parquet/Arrow), and clearer eviction policies.

title: Zooming option for graphviz plots
author: hackenjoe
summary: Request for zoom/pan capabilities in `st.graphviz_chart`. Large diagrams are hard to read without interactive navigation.

title: Tooltips on `st.image` and other media elements
author: remisphere
summary: Request for tooltips on `st.image` and other media elements. This allows providing extra context (metadata, description) on hover.

title: Streamlit protobuf names may collide with those of other packages
author: thiemoToadi
summary: Streamlit's internal Protobuf definitions conflict with other libraries (like `supervisely`) that use Protobuf, causing `TypeError` on import.

title: Configurable location for persistent cache
author: NoahAmsel
summary: Request to configure the directory for persistent cache storage. Users want to store cache outside the default user home directory.

title: Server shutdown fails to exit while processing infinite loop
author: AnOctopus
labels: type:bug, good first issue, status:confirmed, priority:P3, area:backend
summary: Streamlit server fails to shut down cleanly if a script is stuck in an infinite loop. The process hangs and requires a kill signal.

title: Time or event (websocket/redis) callbacks
author: schaumb
summary: Request for event-driven callbacks (time-based, websocket, etc.) to trigger updates without user interaction. This supports real-time data feeds.

title: Custom components - send data after creation
author: schaumb
summary: Request for custom components to receive data updates from Streamlit *after* creation, enabling bi-directional communication without full reruns.

title: Add option to limit st.cache size by memory footprint rather than total number of entries
author: Zerthick
summary: Request to limit `st.cache` by memory usage (MB/GB) rather than just the number of entries (`max_entries`). This better prevents OOM errors.

title: Altair mark_geo chart not rendered
author: SteinsGate9
summary: Altair `mark_geo` charts fail to render in Streamlit. This seems to be a specific compatibility issue with geographic visualizations in Altair.

title: Can't connect to app from iOS device using Basic Authentication
author: raijin0704
summary: iOS devices fail to connect to Streamlit apps when Basic Authentication is enabled (e.g., via ngrok). The page freezes on loading.

title: Trigger a script re-run from another thread
author: tconkling
summary: Request for an API to trigger a rerun for a specific session from another thread. This enables background tasks to update the UI for a specific user.

title: Duplication of ghost app elements
author: iharshulhan
summary: UI elements sometimes duplicate or "ghost" (remain visible when they should be removed) during rapid updates or reruns.

title: Background image
author: gagan3012
summary: Request for a native way to set a background image for the app (`st.background_image`). Currently requires CSS hacks.

title: Deck object with PointCloudLayer cannot be integrated properly with pydeck_chart
author: johntaylor112
summary: PyDeck `PointCloudLayer` integration is broken or incomplete in `st.pydeck_chart`. 3D point clouds do not render correctly.

title: Map centric dashboard/UI panel features
author: ldmtwo
