summary: Request for advanced layout features: resizeable split panes, fixed headers/footers, and nestable scroll areas for building complex dashboards.

title: Update custom components' props in a single script run
author: okld
summary: Request to update a custom component's props within a single script run (e.g., for animation or incremental updates) without a full rerun.

title: set_page_config page icons do not work in Safari
author: akrolsmir
summary: `page_icon` in `st.set_page_config` does not work in Safari. It likely needs a specific `<link rel="apple-touch-icon">` tag.

title: Support choosing an entire month in date picker
author: randyzwitch
summary: Request for a "Month Picker" mode in `st.date_input`. Users want to select a whole month rather than a specific date or range.

title: Only rerun after selecting both dates in `st.date_input`
author: asaini
summary: `st.date_input` triggers a rerun after selecting the first date in a range, showing an error before the second date is picked. It should wait for the full range.

title: st.expander expanded/collapsed state
author: LeoTafti
summary: Request for `st.expander` to expose its state (expanded/collapsed) so other elements can react to it.

title: `st.radio` with sections
author: kierancondon
summary: Request for `st.radio` to support sections/headers within the options list for better organization.

title: Enable horizonal scrolling for wide columns (e.g. with charts)
author: inspectorG4dget
summary: Request for horizontal scrolling in `st.columns` when content exceeds width, rather than cutting it off.

title: Connection timed out - on high latency networks
author: dplutcho
summary: Streamlit apps time out or fail to load on high-latency networks (satellite, hotspots).

title: pydeck_chart not showing different pydeck Views types
author: JovanNj
summary: `st.pydeck_chart` ignores the view type (e.g. OrbitView) specified in the PyDeck object, defaulting to MapView.

title: Rerun when file system/database/some other external data source changes
author: SimonBiggs
summary: Request for Streamlit to watch external data sources (files, DBs) and rerun when they change.

title: Collapsible header
author: karriebear
summary: Request for `st.expander` headers to support Markdown or other Streamlit elements, not just plain text.

title: 2nd Sidebar (on right side)
author: cojacoo
summary: Request for a second sidebar on the right side for additional controls or help content.

title: Add filter functionality to dataframes
author: nthmost
summary: Request for built-in search and filtering functionality within `st.dataframe`.

title: Minimum Characters for text_input
author: kurt-rhee
summary: Request for a `min_chars` parameter in `st.text_input` for validation.

title: Restrict a date selection of weekend days
author: paras9404
summary: Request to restrict `st.date_input` to exclude weekends or specific days.

title: Improve caching of recursive calls
author: jrhone
summary: Caching fails for recursive functions with identity hash functions due to cycle detection issues.

title: Add option to use Memcached as a backend for st.cache
author: puhoshville
summary: Request to support Memcached as a backend for `st.cache` to share cache across replicas.

title: Make Streamlit easy to deploy as a standalone executable (e.g. PyInstaller, Electron)
author: DylanModesitt
summary: Request to make it easier to deploy Streamlit apps as standalone executables (Electron/PyInstaller).

title: Streamlit should have support for Internationalization (i18n)
author: fabiommendes
summary: Request for i18n support in Streamlit's UI elements (date picker, menu) to support non-English users.

title: Improve "missing ReportContext" threading error
author: tconkling
summary: Users get "missing ReportContext" errors when using threads. Streamlit should provide clearer guidance on `add_report_ctx`.

title: Improve our format parameter as python format
author: arraydude
summary: Request for Python-style format strings (e.g., `{:,.2f}`) in numeric widgets instead of printf style.

title: [Coming soon] Keyboard shortcuts
author: jrouquie
summary: Request for customizable keyboard shortcuts for widgets and app actions.

title: Select multiple options using autocomplete
author: kantuni
summary: Request for `st.multiselect` to support selecting all filtered options at once.

title: Altair chart does not render correctly when created from a dictionary
author: yannxaver
summary: Altair charts created from a dictionary (`Chart.from_dict`) do not render correctly in Streamlit.

title: `st.write` should show a nice visualization of `UploadedFile`
author: tconkling
summary: Request for `st.write` to display a visual representation of `UploadedFile` objects.

title: Play nicer with scripts that spawn children processes
author: rmartin16
summary: Streamlit leaves orphaned child processes running if a script with multiprocessing is interrupted.

title: Add support for geometry dtype in `st.altair_chart`
author: tommasobonomo
summary: `st.altair_chart` fails to render charts with geometry data types (GeoPandas).

title: st.image, st.video, and st.audio should build image, video, and audio headers (respectively) for raw numpy array data
author: nthmost
summary: Request for `st.image`/`video`/`audio` to automatically handle raw numpy arrays by adding appropriate headers.

title: Enable Streamlit to run multiple applications on Django via Django Channels instead of Tornado
author: MarcSkovMadsen
summary: Request to run Streamlit on Django Channels instead of Tornado for better integration with Django apps.

title: Let file_uploader return path, instead of reading the file in
author: eliska-chalupova
summary: Request for `st.file_uploader` to return a file path or stream instead of reading the whole file into memory.

title: Native component to draw lines, bounding boxes, polygons, and keypoints
author: avn3r-dn
summary: Request for a native component to draw/annotate on images (bounding boxes, lines).

title: Ability to write cookies
author: tconkling
summary: Request for an API to read and write cookies (`st.set_cookie`).

title: Detect common network setup errors in the frontend, and offer advice
author: tconkling
summary: Streamlit should detect common network errors (CORS, firewall) in the frontend and offer troubleshooting advice.

title: RuntimeError: There is no current event loop in thread error with Streamlit and Asyncio
author: jroakes
summary: `RuntimeError: There is no current event loop` when using Asyncio libraries in Streamlit.

title: Add option to run modules
author: kinghuang
summary: Request to run Streamlit apps defined as Python modules (`streamlit run my.module`).

title: Specify browser to be opened
